title: Leading FMCG brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2018 , by consumer reach
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Consumer Reach Points in millions for 10 number of Food Groupss.
The Consumer Reach Points in millions is highest at Food Groups Warburtons and lowest at Food Groups Birds Eye.
The difference of Consumer Reach Points in millions between the highest and lowest Food Groups is 342.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Food Groups, and Consumer Reach Points in millions in each Food Groups on the y axis.
Food Groups Warburtons has the highest Consumer Reach Points in millions and Birds Eye has the lowest Consumer Reach Points in millions.
